mapper.sql:
c.ydyhId = b.id
and (b.name like concat("%",#{sSearch},"%") or b.idCode like concat("%",#{sSearch},"%") or c.meterId like concat("%",#{sSearch},"%") or date_format(c.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d') like concat('%',#{sSearch},'%') or c.payStatus like concat("%",#{sSearch},"%"))
and b.name like concat("%",#{vt_jfjl.name},"%")
and b.idCode like concat("%",#{vt_jfjl.idCode},"%")
and c.meterId like concat("%",#{vt_jfjl.meterId},"%")
and date_format(c.payTime,'%Y-%m-%d') like concat('%',#{vt_jfjl.payTime},'%')
and c.payStatus = #{vt_jfjl.payStatu}
order by c.createdTime desc
mapper.delete: delete from tbJfjl where payStatus = 2 and date(payTime) < date(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 year))
